projectedData.patternTrait:
Blades have an Edge Die, a d6 that starts each mission at 6. After you roll an attack with a Blade, you can choose to either remove the highest die and use it as your new Edge Die, or add your Edge Die to your attack as if youʼd rolled a die with that value.

Once you use an Edge Die, itʼs gone until you create a new one. You can only have one Edge Die at a time.
